events.message: The customer reported an accident involving their car where the rear bumper was damaged in a parking lot collision.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to car damage and vehicle collision.
An agent from the auto claims department has been assigned to handle the case and contact the customer shortly.
The insurance company has acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that it will be processed promptly.
Request sent to customer to submit photos of the damaged car, police report, and driver’s license for claim verification.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including damage photos, police report, and insurance policy copy as instructed.
The claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and inspecting the vehicle condition.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of claim validity and damage matching the reported collision circumstances.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs based on damage assessment and policy terms.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with claim handling so far.
The claim has been officially approved and is now moving forward to the payment issuance stage.
Payment for car repairs has been issued to the customer’s account, covering the agreed settlement amount.
The claim file is now closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair completion from the customer.
